sourcesContent:
export const ADD_DATA_TO_EDIT = 'EDIT'
export const DATA_USER = 'DATA_USER'

export const setAddData = ( id, title, body, userId, createdAt ) =>({
    type: ADD_DATA_TO_EDIT,
    id,
    title,
    body,
    userId,
    createdAt,
})
export const setDataUser = ({id, email, firstname, lastname, age, avatar}) =>({
    type: DATA_USER,
    id,
    email,
    firstname,
    lastname,
    age,
    avatar
})
